T02TD1898E:284a-1: da sa kro dha ba lim bi dhi:/
T02TD1898E:284a-3: khro bo bcu'i gtor ma'i cho ga / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1898E:284a-4: khro bo bcu'i gtor ma ni rang nyid 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas cho ga yan lag gsum gyis mdun du bskyed pa'am yang na bkug ste /
T02TD1898E:284a-5: skad cig gis mdun du dmigs la h'um las lce rdo rje sbu gu'i rnam par blta bar byas la /
T02TD1898E:284b-0: aom a'a:ya m'a nta kri ta ai @284b mam ba lim grihna grihna h'um zhes brjod la bdud rtsi sbyar ba'i sbyor bas gtor ma sbyangs te gong gi sngags lan gsum brjod pas gsol bar bsam mo //
T02TD1898E:284b-1: de nas me tog la sogs pas mchod de zhabs bsil dang so rtsi byin nas /
T02TD1898E:284b-2: dril bu dkrol nas mi bskyod pa ni ye shes chel sogs pa'i bstod pa byas nas yi ge brgya pa brjod la gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1898E:284b-3: de bzhin du khro bo bcu ka la yang bya'o //
T02TD1898E:284b-4: yi ge gsum gyi bar du khro bo bcu'i rang rang gi sngags bcug ste /
T02TD1898E:284b-5: de'i steng du ai mam ba lim gri hana grihn'a zhes bya ba bsnan pa ni sngags so //
T02TD1898E:284b-6: gzhan cho ga thams cad gong dang mthun no //
T02TD1898E:284b-7: khro bo bcu'i gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs so /
T02TD1898E:284b-9: // /'di'i lag len ni mdun du bu las 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa lte ba dang bcu gcig par bsams la /
T02TD1898E:284b-10: de'i steng du aa las zla bar bsam /
T02TD1898E:284b-11: de'i steng du h'um dgu brum dang bcu /
T02TD1898E:284b-12: de rnams gyur pa las 'od 'phros khro bo bcu spyan drangs nas phyag mtshan rnams la thim par bsams la /
T02TD1898E:284b-13: 'khor lo rtsibs bcu'i steng du khro bo bcu bsam mo //
T02TD1898E:284b-14: yang rang gi yi dam ltar bsgoms la snying ga'i sa bon gyis khro bo bcu spyan drangs nas de rnams la bstim ste mgron spyan drangs pa'o //
T02TD1898E:284b-15: de nas gor ma dmigs pa las /
T02TD1898E:284b-18: de'i steng du aom a'a: h'um gsum las thod pa'i skyed pu gsum /
T02TD1898E:284b-19: de'i steng du aa las thod pa phyi dkar ba nang dmar ba bsams te de'i nang du gtor ma /
T02TD1898E:284b-20: de'i steng du bi mu ra shu ma go ku da ha na zhes bya ba yi ge bcu las sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga bskyed la de nas yam las rlung g-yos te me 'bar bas dam tshig ge bdud rtsi sbyang bar bsam /
T02TD1898E:284b-21: de'i steng du padma zla ba'i steng du h'um las rdo rje rten lnga pa la h'um gis mtshan pa de las 'od spros pas 'go min gyi gnas na yod pa'i khor bo bcu'i thugs ka nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi spyan drangs nas de gnyis dbyer med du gyur par bsam mom //
T02TD1898E:284b-22: de nas aom a'a:h'um zhes pa lan gsum brjod pas dbyer med du bsam mo //
T02TD1898E:284b-23: de nas sngags brjod la gdab po //
T02TD1898E:284b-24: de nas grub nas khro bo re la mchod pa re dang bstod pa re bya //
T02TD1898E:284b-25: ma grub na bcu byar la spogs cig bya'o //
T02TD1898E:284b-27: dam tshig pa rang la bsdu ba'am /
T02TD1898E:284b-28: yang khro bo rnams h'um la /
T02TD1898E:285a-3: brum stong pa nyid du bsams la gtor mas gtsang gtor /
T02TD1898E:285a-6: gtor ma de rnams gsol bas chos nyid la thim pa'am //
T02TD1898E:285a-7: ye shes la ye shes thim par bsam mo //
T02TD1898E:285a-8: dur khrod pa rnams gtor ma gsol ba bde bar bsam mo //
T02TD1898E:285a-19: gshin rje mthar byed ni mdog sdo ba /
T02TD1898E:285a-22: phyag g-yas na thob dang ral gri / g-yon na rin po che dang padma'o //
T02TD1898E:285a-23: shes ba mthar byed ni mdog dkar pa zhal g-yas sngo ba /
T02TD1898E:285a-25: phyag g-yas na dbyug pa deng ral gri / g-yon na rin po che dang padma'o / padma mthar byed ni mdog dmar ba'o ;
T02TD1898E:285a-26: / zhal g-yas nag pa g-yon dkar pa'o //
T02TD1898E:285a-27: phyag g-yas na padma dang ral gri'o //
T02TD1898E:285a-28: g-yon na rin po che dang 'khor lo /
T02TD1898E:285a-29: bgegs mthar gyed ni mdog sngo ba'o //
T02TD1898E:285a-30: zhal g-yas dkar g-yon dmar pa'o //
T02TD1898E:285a-31: phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang ral gri / g-yon na rin po che dang padma'o //
T02TD1898E:285a-32: 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni mdog sngon po //
T02TD1898E:285a-33: zhal g-yas dkar g-yon dmar ba'o //
T02TD1898E:285a-34: phyag g-yas na lcags kyu dang ral gri / g-yon na rin po che dang padma'o //
T02TD1898E:285a-35: dbyug sngon can ni mdog sngon po zhal g-yas dkar g-yon dmar ba'o //
T02TD1898E:285a-36: phyag g-yas na dbyug pa sngon po dang ral gri'o //
T02TD1898E:285a-37: g-yon na rin po che dang padma'o //
T02TD1898E:285a-38: stobs po che ni mdog sngon po //
T02TD1898E:285a-39: zhal g-yas dkar g-yon dmar pa'o //
T02TD1898E:285a-40: phyag g-yas na rtse gsum dang ral gri / g-yon na rin po che dang padma'o //
T02TD1898E:285a-41: mi g-yo ba ni mdog sngo ba /
T02TD1898E:285a-42: zhal g-yas dkar g-yon dmar ba'o //
T02TD1898E:285a-43: phyag g-yas na ral gri dang rdo rje /
T02TD1898E:285a-44: g-yon na zhags pa dang 'khor lo //
T02TD1898E:285a-45: mig zur gyi gzugs kyi lta ba byis pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1898E:285b-0: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ni mdog ser po zhal g-yas sngo ba g-yon dkar ba'o / phyag g-yas na 'khor lo ser po dang ral @285b gri / g-yon na rin po che dang padma'o //
T02TD1898E:285b-1: gnod mdzes rgyal po ni mog sngo ba zhal g-yas dkar ba g-yon dmar ba'o //
T02TD1898E:285b-2: phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang ral gri / g-yon na rin po che dang padma'o //
T02TD1898E:285b-3: khro bo 'di dag thams cad kyi phyag 'og ma gnyis ni rang 'od la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya'o ;
T02TD1898E:285b-4: / gshin rje gshed la rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1898E:285b-5: padma mthar byed la ni snang ba mtha' yas kyis dbu brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1898E:285b-6: gzhan thams cad la ni mi bskyod pas dbug brgyan pa'o //
